div.bibl: Novi Svijet Vol. V, No. 24, Jan. 12, 1928 NATIONAL DRAMA

body.p: The committee of the Jugoslav Educational Association of Chicago is sponsoring a play, in four acts, of national life in Jugoslavia. The name of the play is "Djevojacka Kletva" (Maidens Curse).
It will be presented by the dramatic club Nada in C. S. P. S. Hall, West 18th and May streets, Sunday, February 9, 1928.
This very touching drama will be remembered a long time.
